titleStmt.title: The first p[art]. To the tune of Lilli Bullero. The second part.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by S. Bridge, in Austin-Friers; and sold by J. Nutt, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "Come all that wish well, to th' land where we dwell,".
